item.description: Why develop a project for a single blockchain when you can easily create a powerful cross-chain dApp? In this workshop, learn how to write secure cross-chain smart contracts and build advanced applications for the increasingly multi-chain Web3 ecosystem. By diving into the details and a demo of Chainlink’s Cross Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP), you’ll discover methods for sending messages, instructing transfer tokens, and initiating actions across multiple networks.
item.title: Build Secure Cross-Chain Applications With Chainlink CCIP on EthGlobal Paris
